description: Plenty of bite in this salad enchanced by the flavour of smoked chilli.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Corn,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Black bean, Tomato, Charred Corn & Chilli Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up an pan to a medium heat and fry the drained sweetcorn with the butter on the pan while tossing for 6 minutes or until the corn starts to brown.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool while you prepare the rest of the ingredients. Combine your dressing ingredients by mixing well in a serving dish and set to one side.
Cook the black beans as per tin instructions and then drain and set to one side. Combine all your ingredients together and serve with the dressing on the side or combined if you wish.
